id: J Crew's CEO steps down after a short run
paragraph: FOLLOW CNN BUSINESS By Nathaniel Meyersohn, CNN BusinessUpdated 2:02 PM ET, Sat November 17, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)J Crew's CEO is stepping down less than two years into the job, a sign of turmoil as the retailer heads into the holiday shopping stretch.Most stock quote data provided by BATS.
